name: Bus Driver: City Academy
description:
Practice yourself in Bus Driver: City Academy and test your skills for real driving. In Bus Driver: City Academy, we will offer you to get the driving skills of different level Bus Parking and level yourself up to your impossible bus parking skills.
If you think that you are pro of these bus parking 2018 game then think again because in this Bus Driver: City Academy you'll have things in your table. It's almost Impossible to complete your tasks without hitting any Bus Parking Cones or bus or blocks in this Bus Driver: City Academy game.

Features:
• Precise parking
• Offline game play
• Real 3D modern city environment
• HD graphics
• Amusing sounds
